feed.title: Wapy.dev Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.2.1
entry.content:
Fixes: - SEO data is updated. - Viewport maximum scale is removed. - Contact form email is redesigned. - Minor UI and text updates.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.2.2
entry.content:
Enhancements: - JSON LD schema is added.

Fixes: - Unnecessary leaked user information and ID's are removed from actions and queries. - Minor UI and code updates.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.2.3
entry.content:
Fixes: - User information and email leak is fixed. - Reverting github actions network host changes. - Minor ESLint fix.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.3.0
entry.content:
Enhancements: - Single entry view is added. Single entry view give more subscription specific information and reports. (#3) - Subscription per category is added on modal in reports page. (#57) - Various UI enhancements - Package updates.

Fixes: - Auth domains are fixed to support http and IP addresses. (#56) - Various bug fixes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.2.3...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.3.1
entry.content:
Fixes: - View page bug is fixed for disabled subscriptions. (#3) - Router refresh is fixed when OTP login is used. - Package updates.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.3.0...v1.3.1
